title.rendered: “IDF Forces Quash Terror Threats: Decisive Actions in Central Gaza Strip”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Elimination of terrorists and destruction of terror infrastructure; extermination of a terrorist who participated in the October massacre.

The combat team forces of the Nahal Brigade continue to operate in the central Gaza Strip area, and in the past day, the fighters have eliminated a number of terrorists in close-range battles.
During the operation, the forces have eliminated many terrorists who posed a threat to the forces by means of aircraft and sniper fire.

In the past day, the air force attacked and destroyed military buildings, launch sites, and numerous terror infrastructures in the Strip area.
As part of the attacks, fighter jets attacked a launch site, military building, and subterranean tunnels in an area from which launches were identified towards the Re’im area yesterday (Monday).

In addition, an IDF aircraft eliminated a terrorist who participated in the October massacre in the Khan Yunis area.

Attached are pictures from the IDF’s operations in the Strip: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC09042024237564

Attached is footage from the attacks in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/3TOK8Bj
